subject: Breeders' Cup World Thoroughbred Championships
Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Mets catcher Paul Lo Duca is hoping his filly, Grace Anatomy, can do in Saturday’s $2 million Juvenile Fillies what his team could not during the season: get the job done in the stretch.
snippet: Mets catcher Paul Lo Duca is hoping his filly, Grace Anatomy, can do in Saturday’s $2 million Juvenile Fillies what his team could not during the season: get the job done in the stretch.
